altername_name: Kids Station: Hello Kitty no Oshaberi Town
name: Kids Station: Hello Kitty no Osyaberi Town
overview: Kids Station - Hello Kitty no Osyaberitaun is a collection of 16 mini games in witch you control Hello Kitty in different kind of situations, this time the players can learn about colours, number, sounds, animals, etc. The mini games go from paint a drawing, buy items at the market, clean the room, catch butterflies, set the clock time, etc. There are even some 2 player mini games.
